/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant graffiti, adding a touch of urban artistry to the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the background. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
